mapper.select: SELECT DATEDIFF(deadline, DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d')) as deadlinecount, mb.mansearch_sno, mb.pay, mb.corp_location, mb.position, mb.required_career, mb.job_type, mb.required_skill, mb.deadline, mb.main_task, mb.sub_task, mb.work_start,mb.education_level, mb.work_type, mb.pay_date, b.subject, c.corp_logo, c.corp_name FROM mansearch_board mb LEFT JOIN board b ON mb.sno = b.sno LEFT JOIN member m ON b.id = m.id LEFT JOIN corperation c ON m.id = c.id WHERE b.boardtype = 'mansearch' ORDER BY b.sno desc

SELECT DATEDIFF(deadline, DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d')) as deadlinecount, mb.pay, mb.pay_date, mb.education_level, mb.work_type, mb.corp_location, mb.position, mb.required_career, mb.job_type, mb.required_skill, mb.deadline, mb.main_task, mb.sub_task, mb.work_start, b.subject, b.doc, c.corp_logo, c.corp_name, c.manager_name, c.manager_phone, c.manager_email FROM mansearch_board mb LEFT JOIN board b ON mb.sno = b.sno LEFT JOIN member m ON b.id = m.id LEFT JOIN corperation c ON m.id = c.id WHERE b.boardtype = 'mansearch' and mb.mansearch_sno = ${mansearch_sno}
